name: Clable
description:
Clable 

Its about climbing.  

This game is made with gamepad sticks control in mind.  

Gamepad:

- Sticks - move arms

- Triggers - grab

Keyboard: 

- Left arm - WASD + Space/Shift

- Right arm - Arrows/Numpad + Ctrl/Num0

Tools used:

- Language: [Haxe](haxe.org)

- Engine:  [Kha](https://github.com/Kode/Kha)

- Editor: VSCode
